page.title: 09PLANTATIONS
page.content:
The biggest{plantion}is the {Trelowarren Plantation}which is part of the{Trelowarren Estate.The Vivienne family have owend it for over{600} years.The wood was used for making {furniture,building and fire wood. } The trees are mainly{deciduous.}Many of the trees are elms and some of them had to be cut down because they had {Dutch Elm Disease.}When this happened new trees were planted but they were conifers instead of deciduous trees.{Conifers}grow quickly and don't get Dutch Elm Disease.
Several areas in the D.block have had lots of coniferous trees planted by the{Forestry Commission.}Most of the trees that we saw in the D .block were in the plantations but there were some trees around the{edges of fields } especially in the{valleys. }
